item.title: (I)Python Startup Scripts
item.description: Python IPython But why? Basic Imports Custom Functions Taking it to the Next Level Are you a frequent user of Python or IPython interactive shells? Do you find yourself constantly reimporting the same libraries (I’m looking at you from pprint import pprint ðŸ‘€), or redefining the same helper functions? This post will describe how to set up some scripts that will be automatically executed when you run python or ipython in your terminal.
